    Liquid Layouts In InDesign CS6

    Wireframing in InDesign is far less painful than using any other software because it’s easy to maintain styles on objects and typography. I just started using the Liquid Layout feature in InDesign CS6. One more reason to use InDesign for wireframing over any other program.

    This is a helpful walk-through.
